trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control that is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> 에 호스트 된 컨트롤을 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTextBox and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> work together so that users can directly edit values in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control column.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTextBox 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>사용자의 값을 직접 편집할 수 있도록 함께 작동 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>제어 열.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and is designed to host the DataGridTextBox, which derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>에서 파생 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>를 호스팅하는 DataGridTextBox에서 파생 되 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties, events, and methods of the base control, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> events with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 뿐만 아니라 속성, 이벤트 및 기본 컨트롤의 메서드를 호출할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>됨 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> is in a mode that allows either editing or navigating.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> 편집 이나 이동을 허용 하는 모드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The IsInEditOrNavigateMode property is used within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A> to determine how to process key press events, to check the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: IsInEditOrNavigateMode 속성은 다음과 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> 의 상태를 확인할 키 누름 이벤트를 처리할 방법을 결정 하기 위해</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A> 내에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one of the navigation (arrow) keys is pressed, the appropriate action for the state of the control must occur.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 (화살표) 탐색 키 중 하나를 누르면 컨트롤의 상태에 대 한 적절 한 조치 수행 되어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the controls is in navigation mode, and editing has not begun; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤 편집 및 탐색 모드에 있으면이 아직 시작 되지 않으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the key pressed is processed further (for example, to navigate, or escape).
trans-unit.target: 키를 누르면 처리 여부를 나타냅니다 (예: 탐색 또는 이스케이프) 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 읽기 전용입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 키보드 메시지를 받을 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that contains the key data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, 키 데이터를 포함 하는 참조로 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is consumed, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to if the key is further processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>키 사용 되는 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 키가 추가로 경우로 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control belongs.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> 컨트롤이 속한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control that hosts the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> 컨트롤을 호스트 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.
